4c67d0f5-3d57-4ddd-b605-68565c5efe5a.name: ULT POWER SOUND series | ULT FIELD 7 Wireless Portable Speaker
about_us: Press the ULT button to boost your bass.
Powerful sound with X-Balanced Speaker Unit.
Lighting to liven up your party.
Take the party outside with an IP67 rating.1
Endless partying with up to 30 hours of battery life and quick charging.2
Inputs and setting in one place.
Add an extra speaker for stereo sound.4,5
Bluetooth® Fast Pair and Multipoint connection.7,8
Link up to 100 compatible speakers to synchronize music and lighting through Party Connect.3,5
7-band equalizer to adjust your sound settings.6

Interface.Input and Output Terminals:
Stereo Mini Jack(IN): YES,
USB A: YES,
Guitar/MIC Input: YES

Size & Weight.Dimensions (W x H x D): Approx. 512 mm x 224 mm x 222 mm

All features: Sony brings you closer to the music and the artists you love. Watch exclusive videos and enter to win prizes only available for Sony fans.

Our X-Balanced Speaker Unit features an almost rectangular diaphragm, for an increased surface area compared to conventional speaker units. The 114 mm x 114 mm large woofer unit gives clear and deep bass sound.

The non-circular diaphragm not only maximizes the area of speaker diaphragm, but it also increases sound pressure for deeper and punchier bass, less distortion and greater vocal clarity. For a richer, clearer, and more rewarding listening experience.
By detecting local noise, it automatically changes the sound setting to deliver clear music even when you are surrounded by other sounds.
Select your favorite sound setting with the Sony | Music Center app and hear your music exactly as you like it.6

Our X-Balanced Speaker Unit features an almost rectangular diaphragm, for an increased surface area compared to conventional speaker units. The 114 mm x 114 mm large woofer unit gives clear and deep bass sound.

The non-circular diaphragm not only maximizes the area of speaker diaphragm, but it also increases sound pressure for deeper and punchier bass, less distortion and greater vocal clarity. For a richer, clearer, and more rewarding listening experience.
By detecting local noise, it automatically changes the sound setting to deliver clear music even when you are surrounded by other sounds.
Select your favorite sound setting with the Sony | Music Center app and hear your music exactly as you like it.6
Liven up your day with punchy bass and expressive lighting wherever you go.  Bring the music anywhere for longer, thanks to the water and dustproof construction plus a long battery life.  You can even connect to a mic for karaoke on the go.
Dive into the front row of a concert with the ULT POWER SOUND series.  Built for music lovers, it produces powerful deep sound designed to make your heart tremble. Prepare to feel the bass.
Karaoke and guitar: Plug in the mic, pick a song, and sing your heart out. Or, you can connect a guitar and use the ULT FIELD 7 as an amp too.
Boost the music: Enhance all your low-end frequencies for exceptional bass. Enjoy two different types of bass-emphasized sound.  Powerful bass to feel the beat and get you dancing.  Deep bass boost for low-frequency sound that will make your heart tremble.  With the powerful sound and ambient lighting together, you can lift your music experience up to enjoy with your friends.
Press the ULT button to enjoy the powerful sound of ULT1 and ULT2. Select ULT1 for deeper, lower frequency bass. Select ULT2 for powerful, punchy bass.
Listen loud and clear: The X-Balanced Speaker Unit emits a deep, punchy bass and vocal clarity at any volume.  For higher frequencies, a high efficiency tweeter fills the room with crisp sound. Passive radiators optimize the sound to enhance clear bass. Put it all together and you get an audio experience worth sharing with your friends.
Energize your party with dynamic lightin: Bring the ultimate vibe with colorful lighting that synchronizes with your music and is easily controlled via the Sony | Music Center app and Fiestable app.6
Carry anywhere: Throw a party anywhere for longer, thanks to the easy to carry handles, water, and dustproof design, with long battery life.1,2
Get a handle on your music: With its comfortable and stylish handle, the ULT FIELD 7 is made for taking with you wherever you want your music to go.
Take it outside: With an IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating,1 this speaker is ready for listening by the pool, at the park or wherever you like, no matter how dusty the surface.  It's also rustproof, which means you can enjoy music even at the beach.
The party never stops: With up to 30 hours of battery life,2 keep the party alive all night.
Charge in just 10 minutes: With quick charging, 10 minutes gets you up to 3 hours of playing time.2
Take care of your battery: The Battery Care function means you never have to worry about overcharging your speaker, so it’s more dependable for longer.
The choice is yours: Stood up or laid on its side, you can position the ULT FIELD 7 horizontally or vertically, so it makes the most effective use of space.
Inputs and settings in one place: Designed for convenience, find all the inputs and controls on the rear panel, including Echo and Key Controls.
Music that really gets you moving with P: Link up to 100 compatible speakers to synchronize music and lighting through Party Connect - fill any location with powerful sound to create the ultimate party atmosphere in any location.3,5
Add an extra speaker for stereo sound: Connect two ULT FIELD 7 speakers via Bluetooth® to activate stereo sound (left and right), to experience a rich sense of presence.4
Bluetooth\u00ae Fast Pair8 and Multipoin: In one tap, the ULT FIELD 7 enables quick, effortless Bluetooth pairing with your Android™ devices. For total convenience, the ULT FIELD 7 can be paired with two Bluetooth devices at the same time, so you can instantly switch between listening to audio from different devices.5,7,8
USB Play, and charge devices: Plug in and play music with USB connectivity, and you can use the ULT FIELD 7 to charge up your other devices.10
Sony | Music Center: Optimize audio settings, select playlists, and control Party Connect. Manage your devices right from your phone with the Sony | Music Center app.6
Fun features with Fiestable: Use fun features, such as DJ control and the lighting function, from your phone with this handy app.6
Aiming for a zero environmental footprin: Inspired by the beauty of the world, we are doing our part to help preserve the Earth while still offering superior sound quality and listening experience. With a goal of achieving a zero environmental footprint across the entire Sony Group by the year 2050, we are accelerating numerous environmental initiatives.
Sustainability in mind: Our product are designed not only to pursue sound quality, but also to consider the environment.  The recycled plastic11, 12 is partially used for the body of the ULT FIELD 7. This reflects how we strive to reduce the environmental impact of our products.
Accessibility: We believe technology should make the world more interactive, more creative, more entertaining, and more inclusive. By incorporating human-centric, inclusive design into our audio products, we deliver our KANDO experience to all users, regardless of age, ability or environment.
